main_definition: Campaigns refer to organized efforts or initiatives with the goal of achieving a specific objective, often involving promotional activities, political actions, or marketing strategies.

meanings_and_examples.example: The presidential candidate launched his re-election campaign with rallies across the country.
The company started a new advertising campaign to promote its latest product launch.
A local hospital organized a healthcare campaign focusing on raising awareness about heart disease prevention.
The non-profit organization initiated a charity campaign to raise funds for building schools in underprivileged communities.
